Create a new connection

Select a new connection from the choices displayed

Click on the Add a new connection button in the left tyoolbar menu

Configuring Connection Settings

For all connections :

  • Test the Connection: Click Test Connection to verify if the connection works

  • Save: Click Save. The connection appears in the database choices

Oracle connection settings

Settings

Description

Host

IP Address or Host Name

Port

The port number for the connection (1521 by default)

Database

The name of the specific database you want to connect to

Username and Password

The credentials required for authentication

Connection name

Assign a specific name to the connection for easier identification
